author: knoepfel
body:
This pull request does not include any functional or interface changes.  Rather, this pull request includes cleanups of `DQMStore` before embarking on implementing concurrent booking in earnest:

- Quite a bit of tidying using modern C++
- Removing the global `IBooker`/`IGetter` global members of `DQMStore` in favor of creating local ones on the fly whenever transaction booking takes place
- Improving the RAII usage

There was an uninitialized data member for one of the `DQMStore` constructors.  That has been fixed by relying on default-value (i.e. in-class) initialization, and by using a forwarding constructor.
title: DQMStore cleanup in preparation for concurrent booking
